translation: translated sūtras, the Tripiṭaka朝散大夫試鴻卿

translation: Guangfan daishi give the purple ascetic ministers Weijing and so forth.

translation: translated by imperial edict

source_sentence: 如是我聞：一時世尊在毘舍離國最勝大城最勝林中，與苾芻眾俱。
translation: Thus I have heard. One time, the World-honored One was staying at Vaiśālī, in the forest of Vaiśālī’s capital city, accompanied by a group of monks.

source_sentence: 時彼城中有長者子，名曰善星，捨離佛法，其來未久，以多種緣，謗佛法僧，
translation: In that city there was an elderly man named Sunetra, who had abandoned the buddha-dharma. Not long after coming there, for various reasons he denigrated the Buddha, Dharma, and Sangha.

source_sentence: 而作是言：「沙門瞿曇！
translation: He said, The ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 尚無人中最上之法，況聖知見最勝所證，入於論難。
translation: There's still no one among the highest dharmas, so why wouldn't a sage who knows and sees the most superior realization enter into the difficulty of discussing it?

source_sentence: 彼為聲聞，宣說諸法，所求所修，以自辯才及不正智，而為所證，其所說法，
translation: They teach the Dharma for the sake of śrāvakas, expounding it. What they seek and practice is realized by means of their own power of elucidation as well as incorrect knowledge.

source_sentence: 豈能出要盡苦邊際？」
translation: How can they escape the essentials and reach the limit of suffering?

source_sentence: 爾時尊者舍利子，於其食時著衣持鉢，入毘舍離大城，次第乞食，聞彼城中善星長者子以多種緣謗佛法僧。
translation: At the time, when Venerable Śāriputra was eating, he put on his robes, took his bowl, entered the great city of Vaiśālī, begged for food in order, and heard that the elderly man Sunetra's son from that city denigrated the Buddha, Dharma, and saṃgha for various reasons.

source_sentence: 時尊者舍利子既行乞已，還復本處，飯食事訖，收攝衣鉢，洗雙足已，
translation: Having done so, Venerable Sāriputta returned to his own place. After having had eaten and after having feasted, he put away his robe and almsbowl and washed his feet.

source_sentence: 往詣佛所，頭面著地，禮世尊足，退坐一面，而白佛言：「世尊！
translation: He approached the Buddha, bowed his head and face to the ground, saluted the Bhagavān's feet, withdrew to sit at one side, and said to him, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我於今日，入毘舍離大城乞食，聞彼城中善星長者子，以多種緣謗佛法僧，
translation: Today, I entered the great city of Vaiśālī to solicit alms food and heard that the son of a wealthy householder named Sunetra in that city denigrated the Buddha, Dharma, and Sangha for various reasons.

source_sentence: 而作是言：『沙門瞿曇！
translation: He said, 'The ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 尚無人中最上之法，況聖知見最勝所證，入於論難。
translation: There's still no one among the highest dharmas, so why wouldn't a sage who knows and sees the most superior realization enter into the difficulty of discussing it?

source_sentence: 彼為聲聞，宣說諸法，所求所修，以自辯才及不正智，而為所證，其所說法，
translation: They teach the Dharma for the sake of śrāvakas, expounding it. What they seek and practice is realized by means of their own power of elucidation as well as incorrect knowledge.

source_sentence: 豈能出要盡苦邊際？』
translation: How can we get rid of the essentials and end the limits of suffering?'

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 彼長者子，捨離佛法，其來未久，斯何等故，發如是言？」
translation: That wealthy man's son has abandoned the Buddha's teaching, and it's not long since he came; why did he say this?

source_sentence: 爾時佛告尊者舍利子言：「汝今當知，彼善星長者子，是大麁惡，覆藏自罪，
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed Venerable Śāriputra, saying: “You should now know that this son of a wealthy householder named Sunetra has committed a great heinous crime by covering his own sins.

source_sentence: 以覆藏故，謗佛法僧，乃發是言。
translation: Because of covering the store, they denigrate the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṃgha, and then they say this.

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: “O Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 如汝所聞，彼長者子出非義語而為誹謗，即作是言：『沙門瞿曇！
translation: As you've heard, that elder son of the wealthy man produces words that don't have meaning and denigrates them, saying, 'The ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 彼為聲聞所說諸法，豈能出要盡苦邊際者？』
translation: How can they get rid of the teachings taught by śrāvakas and reach the limit of suffering?'

source_sentence: 汝當善聽，我今為汝略說其事。
translation: You should listen attentively. I will now briefly explain these matters for you.

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: “O Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於我法中不具信種。
translation: That wealthy man's son doesn't have the seed of faith in my teaching.

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，
translation: The Tathāgatas, Worthy of Offerings, Completely Enlightened, Perfectly Enlightened, Perfect in Knowledge and Conduct, Well-gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed, Tamer of Humans, Teacher of Gods and People, Buddha, Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 十號具足。
translation: The ten epithets are complete.

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於如是事，雖知雖見，以不信故乃發是言：『沙門瞿曇！
translation: That wealthy man's son, even though he knows and sees such things, because he doesn't believe them, then he says, 'The ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 尚無人中最上之法，況聖知見最勝所證，入於論難。
translation: There's still no one among the highest dharmas, so why wouldn't a sage who knows and sees the most superior realization enter into the difficulty of discussing it?

source_sentence: 彼為聲聞，宣說諸法，所求所修，以自辯才及不正智，而為所證。』
translation: They are śrāvakas who proclaim the teachings, seek what they cultivate, and realize them with their own eloquence and incorrect knowledge.'

source_sentence: 由彼心言及彼所見，相續謗故，速墮地獄，如墜重擔。
translation: Because they continually denigrate what they say in their minds and what they see, they'll quickly fall into hell, like a heavy burden that falls.

source_sentence: 又如聲聞苾芻，戒定慧學，皆悉具足，少用勤力，智獲果證，不以為難；
translation: “Furthermore, just as it is not difficult for a śrāvaka bhikṣu to be endowed with the training of morality, meditation, wisdom, and discernment without exerting effort in order to attain the fruit of that knowledge.

source_sentence: 彼墮惡趣，亦復如是！
translation: They'll fall into a bad destiny, and so it is!

source_sentence: 「又舍利子！
translation: Again, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於我法中不具信種。
translation: That wealthy man's son doesn't have the seed of faith in my teaching.

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，於阿蘭若處棲止坐臥，遠離闤闠種種憒閙，
translation: All the Tathāgatas, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Awakened Ones dwell in a forest-dwelling place to rest, sit, and lay down, being far removed from all kinds of noise and confusion.

source_sentence: 人所應用房舍坐臥諸緣具等，亦悉棄置。
translation: The living quarters, seats, bedding, and other objects used by people are also discarded.

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於如是事，雖知雖見，以不信故，乃發是言，而為誹謗。
translation: That wealthy man's son, even though he knows and sees such things, because he doesn't believe them, then he speaks these words and denigrates them.

source_sentence: 由彼心言及彼所見，相續謗故，速墮地獄。
translation: Because they continually denigrate what they say in their minds and what they see, they quickly fall into hell.

source_sentence: 「又舍利子！
translation: Again, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於我法中不具信種。
translation: That wealthy man's son doesn't have the seed of faith in my teaching.

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，離欲離罪息不善法，有尋有伺，離生喜樂，
translation: “All the buddhas, Buddhas, Worthy of Offerings, and Fully Awakened Ones are free from desire, sin, and unwholesome states. They have both discursive thought and discursive examination, and departing from them gives rise to joy and happiness.

source_sentence: 證初禪定。
translation: He realizes the first dhyāna.

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於如是事雖知雖見，以不信故，乃發是言，而為誹謗。
translation: That wealthy man's son, even though he knows and sees such things, because he doesn't believe them, then he speaks these words and denigrates them.

source_sentence: 由彼心言及彼所見，相續謗故，速墮地獄。
translation: Because they continually denigrate what they say in their minds and what they see, they quickly fall into hell.

source_sentence: 「又舍利子！
translation: Again, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於我法中不具信種。
translation: That wealthy man's son doesn't have the seed of faith in my teaching.

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，止息尋伺，內外清淨，心一境性，無尋無伺，
translation: All the Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Enlightened Ones cease discursive inquiry and discursive examination, are pure both inside and outside, their minds are one-pointed, without discursive or discursive examination.

source_sentence: 定生喜樂，證二禪定。
translation: Joy and happiness arise from concentration, and they realize the second meditative state of absorption.

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於如是事，雖知雖見，以不信故，乃發是言，而為誹謗。
translation: That wealthy man's son, even though he knows and sees such things, because he doesn't believe them, then he speaks these words and denigrates them.

translation: Because they continually denigrate what they say in their minds and what they see, they quickly fall into hell.

source_sentence: 「又舍利子！
translation: Again, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於我法中不具信種。
translation: That wealthy man's son doesn't have the seed of faith in my teaching.

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，離於喜貪，如實正知，修捨念行，身受妙樂，
translation: “All the buddhas and enlightening beings who have attained this stage are free of craving, correctly aware as they really are, cultivating mindfulness and equanimity, and experiencing subtle bliss in their bodies.

source_sentence: 離於貪想，如聖所觀，捨念之行，離喜妙樂，證三禪定。
translation: Being free of craving and perception, he observes the noble practice of equanimity, parts with joy and marvelous bliss, and realizes the third meditation.

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於如是事，雖知雖見，以不信故，乃出是言，而為誹謗。
translation: That wealthy man's son, even though he knows and sees such things, because he doesn't believe them, then he speaks these words and denigrates them.

source_sentence: 由彼心言及彼所見，相續謗故，速墮地獄。

translation: Again, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於我法中不具信種。
translation: That wealthy man's son doesn't have the seed of faith in my teaching.

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，苦樂悉斷，離先所有悅意、惱意二種之法，
translation: All the buddhas and enlightening beings of past, present, and future are completely liberated from suffering and happiness. They become free of the two kinds of delightful thoughts and displeasing thoughts that were formerly in existence.

source_sentence: 除苦樂想，捨念清淨，證四禪定。
translation: He removes the perception of pain and pleasure, abandons mindfulness that's pure, and realizes the fourth meditation.

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於如是事，雖知雖見，以不信故，乃發是言，而為誹謗。
translation: That wealthy man's son, even though he knows and sees such things, because he doesn't believe them, then he speaks these words and denigrates them.

translation: Again, Śāriputra!

translation: That wealthy man's son doesn't have the seed of faith in my teaching.

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，過諸色想，離想對礙，於種種想，而不作意，
translation: “All the buddhas and enlightening beings of past, present, and future alike, transcending all conceptions of form or formlessness, are free from conceptions and obstructions. They don’t think of various conceptions as anything other than form.

source_sentence: 緣無邊空，以為行相，證空無邊處定。
translation: Conditioned by limitless emptiness, they take it as their defining characteristic and realize the concentration of the boundless realm of emptiness.

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於如是事，雖知雖見，以不信故，乃發是言，而為誹謗。
translation: That wealthy man's son, even though he knows and sees such things, because he doesn't believe them, then he speaks these words and denigrates them.

source_sentence: 由彼心言及彼所見，相續謗故，速墮地獄。
translation: Because they continually denigrate what they say in their minds and what they see, they quickly fall into hell.

source_sentence: 餘之所證，九次第定，亦復如是！
translation: So it is with the other nine graduated concentrations realized by others!

source_sentence: 「又舍利子！
translation: Again, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於我法中不具信種。

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，於處非處以自智力悉如實知。
translation: All the Tathāgatas, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Awakened Ones truly know with the power of their own knowledge where they are and aren't.

source_sentence: 如來成就如是智力，彼長者子，於如是事，雖知雖見，以不信故，乃發是言，
translation: The Tathāgata has attained such power of knowledge. That wealthy man, knowing and seeing these things but not believing them, spoke thus:

source_sentence: 由彼心言及彼所見，相續謗故，速墮地獄。

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，一切所行所至之道，悉以正智如實了知。
translation: All the tathāgatas, Worthy of Offerings, perfectly enlightened, and all the paths to which they travel are truly known by their right knowledge.

source_sentence: 如來成就如是智力，彼長者子，於如是事，雖知雖見，以不信故，乃發是言，
translation: The Tathāgata has attained such power of knowledge. That wealthy man, knowing and seeing these things but not believing them, spoke thus:

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，於種種界無數世界，悉以正智如實了知。
translation: All the Tathāgatas, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Awakened Ones in the various realms and countless worlds they truly know with right knowledge.

source_sentence: 如來成就如是智力，彼長者子於如是事，雖知雖見，以不信故，乃發是言，
translation: The Tathāgata has perfected the power of knowledge like this. That wealthy man, knowing and seeing something like this, spoke these words because he did not believe in it.

source_sentence: 而為誹謗。
translation: Instead, they denigrate it.

source_sentence: 由彼心言及彼所見，相續謗故，速墮地獄。

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於我法中不具信種。

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，於諸有情，所有無數種種信解，悉以正智稱量，
translation: All the countless various faiths and understandings of all sentient beings of all buddhas, Worthy of Offerings, Completely Enlightened, are measured by correct knowledge.

source_sentence: 如實一一了知。
translation: He knows each one as it is.

source_sentence: 如來成就如是智力，彼長者子，於如是事，雖知雖見，以不信故，乃發是言，
translation: The Tathāgata has attained such power of knowledge. That wealthy man, knowing and seeing these things but not believing them, spoke thus:

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於我法中不具信種。
translation: That wealthy man's son doesn't have the seed of faith in my teaching.

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，於諸有情，差別諸根，悉以正智稱量，如實一一了知。
translation: All the Tathāgatas, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Awakened Ones in all sentient beings' distinctive faculties are truly known by measuring them with right knowledge to know each one.

source_sentence: 如來成就如是智力，彼長者子，於如是事，雖知雖見，以不信故，乃發是言，

translation: That wealthy man's son doesn't have the seed of faith in my teaching.

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，於諸有情，積集諸業，及其壽量，悉以正智稱量，
translation: All the deeds, actions, and lifespans of all buddhas, enlightening beings, Worthy of Offerings, perfectly enlightened, who have accumulated activities for sentient beings, are measured by correct knowledge.

source_sentence: 如實一一了知。
translation: He knows each one as it is.

translation: Again, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於我法中不具信種。
translation: That wealthy man's son doesn't have the seed of faith in my teaching.

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，一切禪定，解脫三摩地、三摩鉢底，染淨所起，
translation: All the meditations, liberations, absorptions, concentrations, and absorptions of all buddhas—the enlightened one, the Worthy of Offerings, the Completely Enlightened One—are produced by defilement and purity.

source_sentence: 悉以正智，如實了知。
translation: They all know it with correct knowledge as it really is.

source_sentence: 如來成就如是智力，彼長者子，雖知雖見，以不信故，乃發是言，而為誹謗。
translation: The Tathāgata has attained such power of knowledge, and even though he knows and sees it, that wealthy man's son doesn't believe it, so he speaks this way and denigrates it.

source_sentence: 由彼心言及彼所見，相續謗故，速墮地獄。

translation: Again, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼長者子，於我法中不具信種。
translation: That wealthy man's son doesn't have the seed of faith in my teaching.

source_sentence: 所有如來、應供、正等正覺，以淨天眼過於人眼，能觀世間一切有情生滅好醜，
translation: All the buddhas, enlightening beings, and fully awakened ones can see all sentient beings in the world with their pure divine eye, which is superior to human eyes.

source_sentence: 若貴若賤，隨業所受。
translation: Whether it's high or low, it's received according to karma.

source_sentence: 若諸有情，於身口意，造不善業，毀訾賢聖，起於邪見，因斯積集邪見業故，
translation: If sentient beings commit unwholesome physical, verbal, or mental actions that disparage the wise and holy ones and give rise to wrong views, as a result of which they accumulate wrong views.

source_sentence: 身壞命終，墮在惡趣，生地獄中；
translation: At the breaking up of the body at death they fall into a bad realm of existence and are reborn in hell.

source_sentence: 若諸有情，於身口意，造眾善業，不毀賢聖，起於正見，因斯積集正見業故，
translation: If sentient beings perform various wholesome deeds in body, speech, and thought, they do not disparage the wise and holy. They give rise to right view. Because of this, they accumulate right view action.

source_sentence: 身壞命終，生於善趣天界之中。
translation: When his body breaks up and his life ends, he's born in the heavenly realm of a good destiny.

source_sentence: 即以天眼及以正智，悉見悉知。
translation: That is, with the divine eye and right knowledge, he sees and knows them all.

source_sentence: 二者、如來、應供、正等正覺，諸漏已盡，於大眾中，作如是言：『我得安樂無恐無畏，

source_sentence: 如實了知聖所行處，作師子吼，轉大梵輪，餘不能轉，我不見有一切沙門、婆羅門及天人、魔、梵與我等者。』
translation: They truly know the place where the noble ones practice, make a lion's roar, turn the great Brahmā wheel, and don't turn it; I don't see any ascetics, priests, gods, humans, Māras, or Brahmās like me.'

source_sentence: 三者、如來、應供、正等正覺，為隨法行諸聲聞人，宣說所修隨法所行，
translation: 3. The Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, and Completely Awakened One teaches the Dharma to śrāvakas who practice in accordance with the Dharma for the sake of those who practice in accordance with the Dharma.

source_sentence: 如先廣說，最上所證，於大眾中，作如是言：『我說貪欲是障道法，我得安樂無恐無畏，

source_sentence: 如實了知聖所行處，作師子吼，轉大梵輪餘不能轉，我不見有一切沙門、婆羅門、及天人、魔、梵與我等者。』
